alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:54PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hardeman, southeastern Haywood and southwestern Madison Counties through 130 PM CST... At 1254 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hillville, or 9 miles south of Brownsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Hillville, Dancyville, Cloverport, Mercer, Toone, Medon, Asbury, Neely, Malesus, Cedar Chapel, Vildo, Hickory Point, Hatchie, Uptonville, Sunnyhill, Morton Hill, Teague, Denmark and Leighton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
